executive_summary.key_advantage: Military population strengthens federal grant applications

population_characteristics.young_families: Military families drive down median age

tax_base_impact.percentage_reduction: 13.5% of households don't pay local property tax

service_utilization_patterns.healthcare: Many use military healthcare vs community services
service_utilization_patterns.infrastructure: Heavy use but limited long-term investment interest

military_household_contributions.bah_contribution: Some receive housing allowance but don't pay property tax
military_household_contributions.federal_tax_contribution: Pay federal taxes that fund grants

funding_strategy_adjustments.federal_justification: Military population strengthens federal grant applications

federal_grant_advantages.military_community_priority: DOD prioritizes quality of life for military families
federal_grant_advantages.federal_agency_support: Easier to get federal agency backing

demographic_advantages.young_families: High demand for safe pedestrian infrastructure
demographic_advantages.health_conscious: Active lifestyle aligns with walkability goals
demographic_advantages.diverse_experience: Bring best practices from other installations

economic_benefits.federal_spending: BAH recipients bring federal money to local economy
economic_benefits.property_values: Good schools and infrastructure attract military families

community_engagement.family_readiness_groups: Partner with existing military support networks
community_engagement.spouse_clubs: Engage military spouses in planning process
community_engagement.newcomer_briefings: Include infrastructure info in military orientation
community_engagement.base_liaison: Establish formal communication with Fort Meade leadership

funding_approaches.military_family_focus: Highlight benefits to military families in applications
funding_approaches.dod_partnerships: Explore Department of Defense community partnership grants
funding_approaches.congressman_engagement: Leverage military constituency for political support

project_design_adjustments.rapid_implementation: Faster timelines to benefit current residents
project_design_adjustments.maintenance_planning: Design for durability with less community maintenance

long_term_sustainability.institutional_partnerships: Partner with schools, churches for continuity
long_term_sustainability.professional_management: Hire staff vs rely solely on volunteers

cost_distribution.military_household_benefit: Receive benefits without direct property tax

roi_adjustments.bah_rate_influence: Higher property values may increase BAH rates
roi_adjustments.community_reputation: Positive for base relations and future funding

risk_mitigation.federal_funding_focus: Reduce dependence on local property tax
risk_mitigation.institutional_partnerships: Work with base leadership for continuity
risk_mitigation.rapid_implementation: Complete projects before major personnel turnover

recommendations: Increase federal funding target to 90% of total cost
Partner with Fort Meade leadership for community support
Emphasize military family benefits in grant applications
Design for rapid implementation due to personnel turnover
Create institutional partnerships for project continuity
